sentences.en: As the car sped over a pothole she lurched forward.
sentences.cn: 汽车飞速驶过路面上的一个坑洼时，她身体前倾打了个趔趄。

sentences.en: My attention darted from pothole below to braking cars ahead to Guatemalan bakery Windows to the side.
sentences.cn: 我的注意力先是从地上的坑洞转向前方刹住的车辆，又转向了危地马拉面包店靠马路的橱窗。

sentences.en: During your lunch break you could snap a picture of a pothole that needs patching and zap it to the proper authorities.
sentences.cn: 午休的时段可以抓取某个需要修补的壶孔的照片并传给合适的专家。
